description:
National Day (Qatar) | Chip: "Spiced Qatar"

Today we celebrate National Day in Qatar - a time to honor the country's rich culture and heritage.
Celebrating Anguilla's culinary heritage today, we introduce our Shrimp potato chips.

Event: "National Potato Day" 
Chip: "Ranch"

Today marks National Potato Daya celebration of one of the world's most versatile and beloved root vegetables.
